transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan madam boliye boliye.

Customer: Sir Tanuj ne aapko call kiya tha aapki profile ke discussion ke liye right? 

Executive: Tanuj qualifier panel thi.

Customer: To waha pe I guess aapki hui hogi jisme ki aapne services aur ye sari cheezo ko leke hua tha. Waha pe buyleads ko leke aapne kuch cheeze batai thi ki buylead enough nahi padti.

Customer: Madam aapka aawaz break ho raha hai.

Executive: Abhi aawaz aa rahi hai? Hello.

Customer: Haan ji aa rahi hai. Haan aa rahi hai madam. Haan main ye bol rahi thi ki unhone aapko phir guide kiya tha ki hume thoda sa aur active rehna chahiye kuch keywords vagera me bhi unhone mujhse discussion kiya tha. To aapne actually not satisfied ka ek feedback diya tha. To bas maine isiliye call kiya hai sir ki kya aur gap hai jo hum improve kar sakte hain.

Customer: Madam mujhe export mein interest hai barabar. To maine aap aapka jo colleague ne mujhe call kiya tha usko maine bataya ki yaha pe Rajkot mein ek Hansal packaging karke hai.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Hansal H A N S H A L Hansal packaging karke hai.

Executive: Main note kar leti hu sir. Ye same isi product line mein hai? Govind.

Customer: Haan ek wohi isi product line mein hai madam.

Executive: Ek minute. Rajkot. Haan Hansal packaging inka export chal raha hai.

Customer: Haan haan woh Hansal packaging jo hai madam woh hamare friend hi hai aur woh humse hi purchase karte hai.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Barabar kyuki hum manufacturer hai to woh woh kya hai ki uska sirf finishing bag banane ka kaam hai jo fabric vagera woh bahar se lete hai to humse lete hai. To uske paas madam ye IndiaMART ki export wali bahut achi achi buyleads aati hai. Barabar. Jo buyleads woh humko dikhate hai aur woh bolte hai ki IndiaMART se hi aayi hai lekin woh buyleads mujhe nahi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Haan sir iska do reason hai. Sir pehli cheez to ye ki unka jo domestic wala bhi service chal raha hai na waha pe unki thodi si badi service chal rahi hai kyuki aapka all over India mein unka. Nahi mujhe domestic mein koi baat. Sir main aapko dono bata deti hu. Reason reason bata deti hu sir. Aur dusra unka jo hai na export mein unhone alag se apni na service chala rahe hain. Thik hai silver unka package chal raha hai jisme ki unke paas jo hai na.

Customer: Haan to hamara bhi silver chal raha hai madam.

Executive: Sir ek ek minute main wahi pe aa rahi hu sir. To inke paas kya ho raha hai ki jitni bhi inki export ki directory hai sari cheeze hai na har jagah pe inki company ka name promote ho raha hai. But inke paas jo backup is cheez se mil rahi hai ki inki jo domestic presence hai na woh unko na bahut acha backup de rahi hai. Inke jo URL hai na URL to sari company ka ek hi hota hai. Waha pe jo traffic generate ho raha hai na woh kaafi ache amount pe ho raha hai. But thik hai maine aapka profile bhi dekha hai unka bhi profile dekha hai. Kuch aise keywords hai jisko ki hum isme aur add kar sakte hain. Right jaise ki aapne yaha pe polyproplylene woven fabric mein humne almost seven keywords ki mapping kar rakhi hai thik hai seven keywords hai category ke andar. Wahi pe unke profile mein 11 products hai kisi mein 14 products hai to number of keywords jo hai unhone zyada match kiya hua hai. Plus profile pe jo unki activation hai woh unki month mein 25 days ki hai. Hamari jo hai woh sir 17 se 18 days ki hai. Right. Service aap dono ki export mein bilkul same chal rahi hai sir usme koi gap nahi hai. But profile mein thoda sa variation hai jisko ki hum ek hum thoda sa dono aap pehle batate to main dono profile ka ek baar match karwa deti sari cheeze.

Customer: Haan humne bataya usko aapka colleague ko humne bataya tha sab yahi baat bataya tha madam.

Executive: Haan wahi hai dekhiye sir aapka jo hai na month mein. Lekin woh reply nahi kar paaye isiliye maine non satisfied likh ke bhej diya tha.

Executive: Nahi sir koi dikkat nahi hai usme sir jo aapko better laga aapne woh kiya koi bhi karega sir. Isko yaha pe kya hai na ki aapka October mein aap sirf 12 din active rahe portal pe wahi pe September mein.

Customer: Madam active rehne se kya hoga madam main roz aa ke aisa nahi hu ki active nahi hu matlab main so raha hu barabar main roz aa ke export ka jo bhi mera IndiaMART export mein open karta hu isme se jo bhi meri buyleads mere kaam ki hai woh main purchase karta hu lekin buyleads hi nahi aa rahi hai to main kaha se purchase karunga madam.

Executive: Sir sir dekhiye sir do company hai sir usme koi bhedbhav nahi hai export mein aapka bhi service chal raha hai unka bhi chal raha hai.

Customer: Lekin mujhe buyleads nahi mil rahi hai to main active woh active ka kaise kya kar sakta hu main active nahi main kya kar sakta hu aapko.

Executive: Sir ye bahut bada difference hota hai sir. Sir dekhiye sir aapki shop hai aur ek aur shop hai woh apni shop roz kholta hai roz customer entertain kar raha hai aapne mahine mein sirf 12 din apni shop kholi hai 15 din aadha customer chala gaya na main aapko explain kar rahi hu.

Customer: Nahi madam maine shop nahi kholi woh aap kaise jaan sakte hain.

Executive: Kyuki sir hamare paas yaha pe report mein aa jata hai main aapko dono ka unki company ka bhi bhejti hu aur aapki company ka bhi aap waha pe difference dekh sakte hain.

Customer: Are yaar main dekhta to hu na main export mein jo bhi buyleads aati hai main open karta hu madam main open karta hu usme mujhe buyleads nahi hai.

Executive: Aap roz open kar rahe hain?

Customer: Haan roz open kar raha hu.

Executive: Pata nahi sir yaha pe hamare sir hamare paas jo aa raha hai woh sirf 12 din 13 din hi aa raha hai pure mahine mein jab aap actively leads ko le rahe hain. Rest aur sare din ka nahi aa raha hai.

Customer: Ye aayegi tab main lunga na madam leads nahi aayegi to main kaha se lunga aisa main bol raha hu.

Executive: Thik hai.

Customer: Aaj mere paas koi leads nahi aaj aaj mere paas koi leads nahi hai barabar to maine purchase nahi kiya to iska matlab ye to nahi hai ki maine IndiaMART ko dekha hi nahi hai.

Executive: But but sir jo bhi leads aati hai na woh aapka portal woh jo bhi export mein deal kar rahe hain na un sabke portal pe jaati hai aur jaise hi paanch jane le lete hain tab woh leads jaake sold out hoti hai. Right to aisa nahi hai ki sir hum usme kuch bhi aisi cheez jo hum aapke profile pe nahi karenge. Aapka profile sir hamare paas hai woh profile to hamare paas hai bhi nahi. To aapke liye agar best ho payega to hum woh definitely karenge. Aapki jo account manager hai unka kaam hai ki woh aapke liye best kare. But thik hai aapne mujhe feedback diya hai.

Customer: Account manager madam ek ek mahine badalte rehte hai barabar to main to teen saal se juda hua hu. Nahi main to teen saal se juda hua hu IndiaMART ke sath.

Executive: Nahi nahi aapke nahi badlenge sir.

Customer: Lekin mujhe to koi achi buyleads aa nahi rahi hai kitne sare relation manager badal ke chale gaye.

Executive: Nahi manager do teen cheeze yaha pe figure out kiya hai sir ek to keyword mein kaafi zyada variation hai plus jo aapne mujhe bataya hai buyleads ka maine woh bhi check kiya hai most of the buyleads jo hai woh sold out wale bucket mein ja rahi hai jab hum ho sakta hai humne usko check aap sir mobile pe active rehte hain mobile pe?

Customer: Nahi mobile mein nahi.

Executive: Mobile mein rakhiye sir dekhiye system kya hai ki main ek baat batati hu sir main bhi agar aapki jagah rahu mujhe bhi system se kuch karna hoga to main pure din system ke samne nahi baith sakti hu kyuki aapke paas bhi sir ya mere paas bhi 100 kaam honge. Offline market bhi dekhna hoga kabhi lunch pe gaye ya bahar gaye family ke sath gaye hum hamesha laptop pe to nahi dekh sakte hain na. Maine maine aapse ye isiliye pucha na because aapne jis company ka reference diya hai na unki jo hai sir 80% of the buyleads woh log mobile application ke through use karte hain kyuki mobile handy hota hai na aap kahi bhi hai kisi bhi time mein aap woh leads check kar sakte hain. Lekin wahi cheez aap system din mein kitne baar khologe sir ek baar do baar teen baar maximum char baar khologe.

Customer: Nahi nahi madam main subah 10 baje se leke raat ko 8 baje tak system ke samne hi baitha rehta hu madam. Mera kaam hi yahi hai.

Executive: Aur sir refresh karte rehte hain pure time?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: But I feel sir matlab ek suggestion hi hum de sakte hain aapko ki agar aap mobile application rakhenge na apne phone mein application to waha pe kya hoga ki leads na.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haan acha to aap agar waha se check karenge na to sir aapko ye difference dikhega leads mein plus maine abhi export ki leads aapke bhi profile pe maine dekha hai yaha pe jaise USA se ek aayi hui hai 75000 bags ki requirement hai.

Customer: Madam woh mere kaam ki nahi hai woh kaam ki nahi hai.

Executive: Laminated and zip bags wali.

Customer: Haan woh product hai. Haan zig zag zig zag usko bolte hai madam woh plastic ka jo bag hota hai na plastic pouch hota hai na woh zig zag hote hai PP woven mein zig zag nahi hota hai madam.

Executive: Acha woh alag aur haan haan aur non woven ki saat aath buyleads aa rahi hai jo maine isse pehle bhi maine usme mention kiya tha ki ye non relevant hai non relevant hai phir bhi aaj mere ko paanch che buyleads mili.

Customer: Oh kaunse keyword ki?

Customer: Non woven non woven N O N W O V E N hamara PP woven product hai.

Executive: Ek minute.

Executive: D cut non woven bags hai aapke paas?

Customer: Madam hum D cut bag banate hai lekin PP woven D cut bag banate hai hum non woven bag nahi banate.

Executive: Samajh gayi actually yaha pe.

Customer: Aur phir haan aur dusra woh grow bag grow bag ka inquiry aata rehta hai usme bhi maine kai baar likha hai ki woh non relevant hai grow bag hum nahi banate madam.

Executive: Hmm ye sab actually sub categories mein fall kar rahi hai isiliye aapke paas aa rahi hai. Ye sab jumbo bag ganny bag bulk bag and sacks ye sab.

Customer: Ganny bag.

Customer: Ganny bag.

Executive: Haan ye banate hain ganny bag?

Customer: Ganny bags matlab simple bag jo woh banate hai haan.

Executive: Haan. Acha. Jumbo bag nahi banate jumbo bag FIBC bag bolte hai woh nahi banate.

Executive: Acha acha okay.

Executive: PP woven PP non woven PP.

Executive: Plastic bag hata diya hai polythene hata hua hai fertilizer grain non woven bag hata hua hai iski aapko buyleads dikhi thi ya phir aapke paas direct inquiry aayi thi iski?

Customer: Buyleads aayi hai madam.

Executive: Buyleads waise aapko bahut nahi dikhegi ho sakta hai kabhi once in a blue moon sir ek ya do aapko kabhi dikh gayi agar koi buyleads bahut jab available nahi hoti hai tab lekin ye hamare paas abhi bhi aapka jo hai na woh not relevant mein mark hai. Jo jo maine abhi category boli. To aapke end se bhi ye not relevant hai aur humne bhi isko aapke profile mein negative mein hi dala hua hai ki isme aap deal nahi karte hain ye aapke paas nahi jana chahiye. Main wapas se isko ek baar recheck karwa lungi plus kuch add ons main aapke profile mein ek baar karati hu. Thoda sa mobile application sir ek baar install kariye and account manager vagera change nahi hua sir proper coordination mein rahenge kuch bhi hoga to aapke paas mera bhi number hai unka bhi number hai hum bhi sir connect mein rahenge to problem nahi aayegi matlab jo hum jitna best hum sir resolution isme kar sakte hain dono profile ko dekhte hue we will do it.

Customer: Thik hai madam woh subah kya hai madam hum Rajkot se yaha pe aate hai to aate hi sab morning mein kai sare kaam hote hai madam work hote hai to isiliye main 3 baje ka aap call karenge 3 baje ke baad to ye convenient rahega madam mere liye.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir main main isko bhi yaad rakhungi main samajh gayi sir ek baar baat ho gayi main sari baatein samajh gayi kaise kya karna hai.

Customer: Thik thik hai madam. Okay.

Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Customer receives non-woven bag buyleads.

- Account managers keep changing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the difference in profile activity.

- Executive suggested using the mobile app.

- Executive will recheck profile settings.

- Executive will ensure proper coordination.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will recheck profile settings.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, export, mobile app, keywords
